title: Simple as possible
body: Everything should be made as simple as possible, but not simpler.

title: Health
body: The only way to keep your health is to eat what you don’t want, drink what you don’t like, and do what you’d rather not.

title: Poor man
body: I’d like to live like a poor man – only with lots of money.

title: Strong opinions
body: I have opinions of my own – strong opinions – but I don’t always agree with them.

title: Auto correct
body: When is my phone going to learn that I never, ever meant to write “ducked up”.
